text: Colin Collindridge (15 November 1920 â€“ 14 April 2019) was an English footballer. He played as both an outside left and a centre forward. The early part of his playing career happened during World War II. He later played for clubs Sheffield United, Nottingham Forest and Coventry City in the Football League. Collindridge was born in Barnsley, Yorkshire. He died in 2019, at the age of 98. ==References== ==Other websites== * Colin Collindridge at 11v11 Category:1920 births Category:2019 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Nottingham Forest F.C. players Category:People from Barnsley Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Yorkshire
title: Colin Collindridge
